articles.author: Alex Alderson
articles.title: Leaked ASUS ZenFone 8 European pricing pitches the upcoming compact flagship as a OnePlus 9 and Pixel 5 alternative - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: European pricing for the ZenFone 8 has leaked, and it seems that ASUS will position the device as a budget flagship smartphone. The ZenFone 8 should be available with up to 16 GB of RAM and 256 GB of storage, albeit for just €800.
articles.content: 91Mobiles has revealed more details about the ZenFone 8, one of ASUS' upcoming flagship smartphones. Last week, the website published marketing renders and specifications of the device, on which we r… [+1167 chars]
